definition: to press/to extract (juice)/device for extracting juice, oils etc
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: First of all, we bought raw mustard cleaned.
sentences.chinese: 首先我们把买来的生榨菜洗干净。

sentences.english: This paper discuss the processing technology of raw preserved szechuan pickle on preserved szechuan pickle.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了以新鲜大头菜为原料，生产榨菜的加工工艺。

sentences.english: Or their own home flooded eat mustard.
sentences.chinese: 或者自己在家中淹榨菜来吃。

sentences.english: Potassium fertilizer can increase the content of amino acid in the tumorous stem mustard, and improve nutritional quality of it.
sentences.chinese: 施钾肥提高了榨菜氨基酸含量，改善了榨菜营养品质。

sentences.english: Potassium fertilizer can increase the content of amino acid in the tumorous stem mustard, and improve nutritional quality of it.
sentences.chinese: 施钾肥提高了榨菜氨基酸含量，改善了榨菜营养品质。

sentences.english: The invention can be widely used for enterprises of tuber mustard production.
sentences.chinese: 本发明可广泛应用于榨菜生产企业。

sentences.english: This paper expounds the cultural composition of Fuling Zhacai.
sentences.chinese: 本文重点论述了涪陵榨菜文化的构成。

sentences.english: I am more than three months pregnant, and also particularly like to eat mustard.
sentences.chinese: 我怀孕三个多月了，也特别喜欢吃榨菜。

definition: preserved dried cabbage or mustard greens
tofu skin (made by drying the skin that forms on the surface of soymilk during cooking, and therefore not actually made from tofu)
